solution_line_template: If Audrey was asleep for {total_sleep_hours} hours last night and dreamed for {dream_fraction} of the time, she dreamed for {dream_fraction}*{total_sleep_hours} = <<{total_sleep_hours}*{dream_fraction}={dream_hours}>>{dream_hours} hours.
The total time Audrey slept without dreaming is {total_sleep_hours}-{dream_hours} = <<{total_sleep_hours}-{dream_hours}={non_dream_hours}>>{non_dream_hours} hours.
